import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { BarChart3, Eye, EyeOff, ArrowLeft } from 'lucide-react'; const SignupPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', company: '', role: '' }); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const [showConfirmPassword, setShowConfirmPassword] = useState(false); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsLoading(true); // Simulate API call setTimeout(() => { localStorage.setItem('isAuthenticated', 'true'); navigate('/app/dashboard'); setIsLoading(false); }, 1000); }; const isFormValid = () => { return formData.firstName && formData.lastName && formData.email && formData.password && formData.confirmPassword && formData.company && formData.role && formData.password === formData.confirmPassword; }; return (
